definition: bride/(dialect) daughter-in-law
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
new/newly/meso- (chemistry)
woman

sentences.english: The voice of bridegroom and bride will never be heard in you again.
sentences.chinese: 新郎和新婦的聲音，在你中間決不能再聽見。

sentences.english: And the Spirit and the bride say, Come.
How fair is thy love, my sister, my spouse!
sentences.chinese: 我妹子，我新婦，你的愛情何其美。

sentences.english: That's the bridal love to You.
For the wedding of the Lamb has come, and his bride has made herself ready.
sentences.chinese: 因爲羔羊婚娶的時候到了，新婦也自己預備好了。

sentences.english: Today's Nephila species are found around the globe in tropical and sub-tropical regions.
sentences.chinese: 現代的絡新婦分佈在全球的熱帶和亞熱帶地區。

sentences.english: On the second daytime, reception the rules bride and adore tea for the elders.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，按規矩新婦要給長輩們敬茶。

sentences.english: God the lover does not desire to share His bride with anyone else.
sentences.chinese: 一個深愛其新婦的上帝不願意將她與別人分享。

sentences.english: Though he holds in his arms the earthbride, the sky is ever immensely away.
sentences.chinese: 雖然天空想把大地新婦擁進臂彎，但它依然無限遙遠。

sentences.english: Thou hast ravished my heart, my sister, my spouse;
sentences.chinese: 我妹子，我新婦，你奪了我的心。

definition: dame
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
to thank sb for favor (esp. emperor or superior official)
person with foresight
adopted son
to have an audience (with the Emperor)
chastity/virginity (of women)/moral integrity (of men)/loyalty/constancy
to make sth difficult/to create obstacles
to rely on/to base oneself on
(of girls) to yearn for love
(of a girl) to feign anger coquettishly
The School Sayings of Confucius (abbr. for 孔子家語|孔子家语[Kong3 zi3 Jia1 yu3])
thus/like this
seriously ill and about to die
reproof/blame
variant of 曉喻|晓喻[xiao3 yu4]
